page.title: 10Transport in Soham
page.content: Most families in Soham own a{car, but the most common form of transport is the{bicycle.}Car owners use their cars most frequently for leisure purposes, but several drive to work. Bicycles are used for similar purposes, and particularly for local shopping. Very few people use{public transport frequently, the majority using it rarely or never. Of those who do use it, the bus is the most commonly used, while for longer journies some people got to Ely or Cambridge for the train. Asked about public transport, about twice as many people thought it inadequate than adequate, the main complaint being that timetabling did not suit working hours.
